fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Monopoly: If you survive to see the end of the game, you will become the only winner (barring players that have already met their win condition, Outsider Destructives, and the Outsider King).
- Foreclosure: At the start of R5, or when a faction is one death away from victory, everyone will be notified that there is a Mountebank. If neither of these conditions are met and a faction would normally win, your victory will be extended by *2 phases*, and everyone will be notified that there is a Mountebank. You gain 2 non-special cards of your choice in either case.
- Rich: Whenever a room requires card points to use, you automatically hold 2 card points available for spend.
- Investment: Whenever you trade cards, you will gain the cards you traded away at the start of the next phase.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Banker: Choose for the Teller to appear in the selection next Day phase. [1 use, Unique, Night]
- Disguise: Appear as a different role for the rest of the phase. [3 uses]

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Survive to see the end of the game.
